Member Function Documentation

virtual bool UUDPSocket::connectServer ( const UString &  server,
int  iServPort 
) [inline, virtual]

This method is called to connect the socket to a server UDP socket that is specified by the provided IP Address and port number. We call the connect() method to perform the connection.

Reimplemented from USocket.

virtual bool UUDPSocket::setServer ( int  port,
int  iBackLog 
) [inline, virtual]

We try to bind the USocket to the specified port number and any local IP Address using the bind() method.

Reimplemented from USocket.
